Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A $(this.trait:color) dreamcatcher. A handmade protective charm created to ward off evil spirits and bad dreams. Made from a thin willow hoop that has been wrapped in threadlike $(this.trait:color) suede strips, with a decorative web constructed of $(this.trait:color) waxed hemp thread, this dreamcatcher spans a full 14 inches across. The suede strips, after being wound around the hoop, dangle below the circular frame at various lengths. A slew of $(this.trait:material) feathers, held on by colorful glass beads, cap the end of each dangling strip of suede.
A $(this.trait:color) dreamcatcher. A handmade protective charm created to ward off evil spirits and bad dreams.

The $(this.trait:material) feathers hanging from the threadlike $(this.trait:color) suede strips of the dreamcatcher are meant to attract and absorb any nightmares, or evil spirits nearby. Out of curiousity, the spirits would then follow up through the strips of suede, while the intricate webbing is intended to confuse them with it's myriad of twists, turns and loops.
The $(this.trait:material) feathers hanging from the threadlike $(this.trait:color) suede strips of the dreamcatcher.
intricate web constructed of $(this.trait:color) waxed hemp thread

An intricate web constructed of $(this.trait:color) waxed hemp thread. Taking a closer look, you aren't quite sure just what you see. Is it the calm smiling face of a woman, a comet, a mountain? Turning your head side to side while staring into the webbing you find many images, but can't settle on which one is the true image meant to be represented by whomever created this work of art.
An intricate web constructed of $(this.trait:color) waxed hemp thread. If you look closer, you think you might make out an image in the decorative thread work.
